OMINAS API Documentation

Generated by IDLdoc

User Guide API Demos Installation Guide

Directory: util/v/

Contents

.pro files

v_abscissa.pro

NAME: v_abscissa PURPOSE: Creates a 1-D abscissa for the given curve compsed of column vectors.

v_angle.pro

NAME: v_angle PURPOSE: Computes the angles between the given arrays of column vectors.

v_cross.pro

NAME: v_cross PURPOSE: Computes the cross products between the given arrays of column vectors.

v_deriv.pro

NAME: v_deriv PURPOSE: Computes tangent vectors to a given curve composed of column vectors.

v_inner.pro

NAME: v_inner PURPOSE: Computes the inner products between the given arrays of column vectors.

v_interior_convex.pro
v_interp.pro

NAME: v_interp PURPOSE: Interpolates column vectors along a curve.

v_mag.pro

NAME: v_mag PURPOSE: Computes the magnitudes of the given array of column vectors.

v_mean.pro

NAME: v_mean PURPOSE: Computes the mean values of the given array of column vectors in the x direction.

v_median.pro

NAME: v_median PURPOSE: Computes the median values of the given array of column vectors in the x direction.

v_mxm.pro

NAME: v_mxm PURPOSE: Performs matrix multiplication.

v_project.pro
v_rot.pro

NAME: v_rot PURPOSE: Computes a rotation matrix between two vectors.

v_rotate.pro

NAME: v_rotate PURPOSE: Rotates the (N,3) column vectors, v, about the (N,3) column vectors, n, by the angles theta.

v_rotate_11.pro

NAME: v_rotate_11 PURPOSE: Rotates the (nv,3,nt) column vectors, v, about the (nv,3,nt) column vectors, n, by the (nv,nt) angles theta.

v_sample.pro

NAME: v_sample PURPOSE: Resamples the given column vectors such that their spacing is uniform.

v_sqmag.pro

NAME: v_sqmag PURPOSE: Computes the squared magnitudes of the given array of column vectors.

v_stdev.pro

NAME: v_stdev PURPOSE: Computes the standard deviations of the given array of column vectors in the x direction.

v_transform_forward.pro

NAME: v_transform_forward PURPOSE: Transforms vectors given rotation matrices and translation vectors.

v_transform_reverse.pro

NAME: v_transform_reverse PURPOSE: Transforms vectors given rotation matrices and translation vectors.

v_unit.pro

NAME: v_unit PURPOSE: Returns unit vectors in the directions given by v.
